verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David.) The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is my light <S%H216><s%> and my salvation; <S%H3468><s%> Whom <S%H4310><s%> shall I fear <S%H3372><s%>? The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is the defense <S%H4581><s%> of my life; <S%H9132><s%> Whom <S%H4310><s%> shall I dread <S%H6342><s%>?

When evildoers <S%H7489><s%> came <S%H7126><s%> upon me to devour <S%H398><s%> my flesh, <S%H1320><s%> My adversaries <S%H6862><s%> and my enemies, <S%H340><s%> they stumbled <S%H3782><s%> and fell. <S%H5307><s%>

Though <S%H518><s%> a host <S%H4264><s%> encamp <S%H2583><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me, My heart <S%H3820><s%> will not fear; <S%H3372><s%> Though <S%H518><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> arise <S%H6965><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me, In [spite of] this <S%H384><s%> I shall be confident. <S%H982><s%>

One <S%H259><s%> thing <S%H259><s%> I have asked <S%H7592><s%> from the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> that I shall seek: <S%H1245><s%> That I may dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of my life, <S%H9132><s%> To behold <S%H2372><s%> the beauty <S%H5278><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> And to meditate <S%H1239><s%> in His temple. <S%H1964><s%>

For in the day <S%H3117><s%> of trouble <S%H9567><s%> He will conceal <S%H6845><s%> me in His tabernacle; <S%H5520><s%> In the secret <S%H5643><s%> place <S%H5643><s%> of His tent <S%H168><s%> He will hide <S%H5641><s%> me; He will lift <S%H7311><s%> me up on a rock. <S%H6697><s%>

And now <S%H6258><s%> my head <S%H7218><s%> will be lifted <S%H7311><s%> up above <S%H5921><s%> my enemies <S%H340><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> me; And I will offer <S%H2076><s%> in His tent <S%H168><s%> sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> with shouts <S%H8643><s%> of joy; <S%H8643><s%> I will sing, <S%H7891><s%> yes, I will sing <S%H2167><s%> praises <S%H2167><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
Hear, <S%H8085><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> when I cry <S%H7121><s%> with my voice, <S%H6963><s%> And be gracious <S%H2603><s%> to me and answer <S%H6030><s%> me.
[When Thou didst say,] "Seek <S%H1245><s%> My face, <S%H6440><s%>" my heart <S%H3820><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Thee, "Thy face, <S%H6440><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> I shall seek. <S%H1245><s%>"

Do not hide <S%H5641><s%> Thy face <S%H6440><s%> from me, Do not turn <S%H5186><s%> Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> away <S%H5186><s%> in anger; <S%H639><s%> Thou hast been <S%H1961><s%> my help; <S%H5833><s%> Do not abandon <S%H5203><s%> me nor <S%H408><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> me, O God <S%H430><s%> of my salvation! <S%H3468><s%>
For my father and my mother <S%H1><s%> have forsaken <S%H517><s%> me, But the Lord <S%H5800><s%> will take <S%H3068><s%> me up.
Teach <S%H3384><s%> me Thy way, <S%H1870><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> And lead <S%H5148><s%> me in a level <S%H4334><s%> path, <S%H734><s%> Because <S%H4616><s%> of my foes. <S%H9596><s%>

Do not deliver <S%H5414><s%> me over to the desire <S%H5315><s%> of my adversaries; <S%H6862><s%> For false <S%H8267><s%> witnesses <S%H5707><s%> have risen <S%H6965><s%> against me, And such as breathe <S%H3307><s%> out violence. <S%H2555><s%>

[I would have despaired] unless <S%H3884><s%> I had believed <S%H539><s%> that I would see <S%H7200><s%> the goodness <S%H2898><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> In the land <S%H776><s%> of the living. <S%H2416><s%>
Wait <S%H6960><s%> for the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> Be strong, <S%H2388><s%> and let your heart <S%H3820><s%> take <S%H553><s%> courage; <S%H553><s%> Yes, wait <S%H6960><s%> for the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
